header.author: Stephen Hales
header.title: An Examination of the Strength of Several of the Principal Purging Waters, Especially of That of Jessop's Well; By the Rev. Stephen Hales D. D. & F. R. S. Communicated in a Letter to Cromwell Mortimer M. D. Secr. R. S. with a Letter from Swithin Adee M. D. F. R. S. to Dr. Hales, on the Virtues of the Said Well
